full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,CHOS SKYONG DREGS PA LCAM SRING LA TSOGS MCHOD ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
colophon_(төгсгөлийн_үг): @005A *, ,(CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I KHYER BDE BA 'DI NI, JANG JONG CHE WANG GIS MDA' 'BANGS TSUL KHRIMS RNAMS DAG MI PHYED PA'I DAD PA LDAN PA MYUNG GNAS PA DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SHES RAB DANG, GSO RTZI KYI BLO RIG DANG LDAN PA DIM CHE BLO BZANG DBANG DANG, DGE SLONG BLO BZANG SANGS RGYAS RNAMS NAN TAN GYIS BSKUL BA'I NGO BSRUNG BA'I PHYIR, BYANG PHYOGS BSTAN PA'I GSAL BYED DZA YA PAndI TA MTSAN GZHAN BLO BZANG SNYAN GRAGS DGE LEGS RNAM RGYAL DPAL BZANG PO'I SLOB MA'I THA SHAL PA, BLO BZANG DPAL MGON MING CAN GYI CHOS SKYONG LCAM SRING DANG CHOS SKYONG GZHAN LA TSOGS MCHOD 'BUL BA'I CHO GA MI MTHONG ZHING, BLA MA YI DAM RNAMS KYI TSOGS MCHOD RNAMS YID YE SHES KYIS 'GRIN NAS BRIS DE LHAG CHAD MA DAG PA DANG TSUL MIN PA'I NYIS SPYOD GZHAN LA THAMS CAD BLA MA LHA TSOGS DANG, KHYAD PAR LCAM SRING 'KHOR BCAS LA BZOD PAR GSOL, SGRIB PAR MI 'GYUR BAR MDZAD DU GSOL, GAL TE LEGS CHA CUNG ZAD YOD NA 'DI BDAG SOGS SEMS CAN THAMS CAD KYI DAM TSIG NYAMS CHAGS SDIG SGRIB RNAMS BYANG ZHING DAG NAS BSTAN 'GRO'I PHAN DON DU MCHOG MTHUN GYI DNGOS GRUB THOB PA'I RGYU RU BSNGO, ,DGE'O, ,MANGGA LAM, ,)
